sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' const Payment = (props) => { const [cardDet, setCardDet] = useState({}) const totalFare = useSelector(state => state.seats.total) const transactionId = Math.floor(100000 + Math.random() * 900000) const [disab,setDisab] = useState(true) console.log(totalFare) console.log(cardDet,"cardssssss") const handleChangeEvent = (e, field) => { let fieldValue = e.target.value setCardDet({ ...cardDet, [field]: fieldValue }) if(cardDet.cardType.length>0 && cardDet.cardNumber.length>0 && cardDet.cardName.length>0 && cardDet.cvv.length>0 && cardDet.expiryDate.length>0 ){ setDisab(false) } } const handleSubmitEvent = e => { e.preventDefault() props.tab(4) } return (
Amount: {totalFare} Transaction Id: {transactionId}
handleChangeEvent(e, 'cardType')} /> visa   handleChangeEvent(e, 'cardType')} /> MasterCard
handleChangeEvent(e, 'cardNumber')} />
handleChangeEvent(e, 'cardName')} />
handleChangeEvent(e, 'cvv')} />
handleChangeEvent(e, 'expiryDate')} />
) } export default Payment;
